title: What can I do if my Y336-A1 phone runs slowly?
answer:
You can use the following methods to clear up your phone memory: 

l   Close applications not in use. 

Go to the **Settings** screen, and touch **Manage apps**. Under **Running**, select the application you want to close, touch **Stop**, and follow the onscreen instructions to close the application. 

**Figure 1-1 **

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141021233754930001.jpg)

l   Clear the application cache. 

Go to the **Settings** screen, and touch **Manage apps**. Under **All**, touch **Clear cache**. 

**Figure 1-2 **

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141021233754457002.jpg)

l   Clear the browser cache and history. 

Go to the **Browser** screen, and touch [ion] > **Settings** > **Privacy & security**. Then touch **Clear cache** and **Clear history**. 

**Figure 1-3 **

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141021233755448003.jpg)

l   Restart your phone.

If the problem persists, back up important data and restore your phone to its factory settings. 

                                 Note: The figures are for
your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
